content: personalized bauble ornaments materials 3 colors of dk weight yarn about 24 6 yards / 10 grams each a great way to use some scrap yarn size 5 dpns darning needle stuffing stitch marker scissors crochet hook abbreviations k knit k1 knit one m1 make one front and back k2tog knit two together ssk slip slip knit tips make sure not to have floats any longer than 3 or 4 stitches otherwise the middle of the bauble will pull inwards when stuffed if you don t know how to do this search for how to catch your floats videos on youtube weave in or tie off all of your ends shortly after starting the decrease row it will be difficult to weave in or tie off your ends if you wait until you are completely finished with knitting the bauble © 2018 annah wadler personalized bauble ornaments cast on 12 stitches leaving a long tail for closing up the bottom hole later on that will be created with your first color and join in the round separate your stitches evenly onto four dpns you should
